mutants.original_line: diffs = [rain - usage for rain, usage in zip(precipitations, water_usages)]
mutants.mutated_line: diffs = [rain + usage for (rain, usage) in zip(precipitations, water_usages)]

mutants.original_line: diffs = [rain - usage for rain, usage in zip(precipitations, water_usages)]
mutants.mutated_line: diffs = [rain * usage for (rain, usage) in zip(precipitations, water_usages)]
